metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7051 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.1. Certain nick names could result in out-of-bounds access when printing theme strings.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7').
